educations.school: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
content: Courses: Software Engineering, Distributed Systems, Operating Systems, Advanced Algorithms, Experience Design

description: Implemented a notification system using AWS services, resulting in a 19% increase in customer satisfaction.
Achieved 80% augment of customer’s analysis architecting CMS using D3.js.
Leveraged web scrapping to ensure the minimum progress by 10%.
Executed a microservices architecture using Docker and Kubernetes to improve the scalability and maintainability of a complex web application by 120%.
Realized Jest, and Cypress in TDD, achieving a test coverage of 90%.
Led the team of 5 engineers and conducted +2 reviews daily to ensure reliable and high-quality coding practices resulting in a 30% reduction in bugs and overall improvement in code quality.
Developed a highly scalable e-commerce platform that can handle 1M transactions per day using React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Redis, and AWS.
Improved customer understanding of complex3D models by 20% using Three.js.
Built a Stripe payment processing and inventory management microservice utilizing Node.js and AWS Lambda, reducing payment processing time by 30% and increasing successful transactions by 20%.
Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and the ability to resolve technical issues in a team setting, resulting in a 20% reduction in post-release bugs.
Built pixel-perfect, mobile-first, and interactive components resulting in a 35% increase in user satisfaction.
Applied complex frontend features such as optimizing performance resulting in a 30% improvement in website loading time and a 15% increase in accessibility compliance score.
Communicated technical concepts and project status updates clearly and effectively to non-technical stakeholders, resulting in a 15% increase in stakeholder satisfaction.

blog.title: User Experience Design – A little more than just design
